title: Saving Grace
description: When a female body is discovered in the local park, Grace Chandler, a Paranormal Activity Specialist in Tupelo, Mississippi, is thrust into a nightmare. Under pressure from her acting director to find the killer and a few missing agents from her department, she races against time to find the monster before he can find his next victim. Will she be able to stop him in time, or will the secrets that are revealed tear her apart?
author: T.R. Lester
